text: Hey <@U04N6N424MB>, quick update on being able to search by record ID. We were going to implement this functionality but we hit a roadblock with what is supported in the crm search endpoint. Weâ€™re reliant on another team to support this and this is not a high priority for them at the moment. Once we can, we will add the ability to search by record ID.
